languages.text: Ксеносы недооценили Лорд-капитана, вышвырнув е{mf|го|е} бездыханное тело на свалку трупов. Но их пыток оказалось недостаточно, чтобы прикончить Вольного Торговца. Путь, ведущий к спасению и возмездию, начинается на самом дне могилы.

The xenos underestimated the Lord Captain and discarded {mf|him|her} to the corpse dump. But their torture failed to finish off the Rogue Trader. The path to escape and vengeance starts at the very bottom of the grave.
languages.original_text: Ксеносы недооценили Лорд-капитана, вышвырнув е{mf|го|е} бездыханное тело на свалку трупов. Но их пыток оказалось недостаточно, чтобы прикончить Вольного Торговца. Путь, ведущий к спасению и возмездию, начинается на самом дне могилы.

traits.locale_text: The xenos have underestimated the Lord Captain and discarded {mf|him|her} to the corpse dump. But their torture failed to finish off the Rogue Trader. The path to escape and vengeance starts at the very bottom of the grave.

The xenos underestimated the Lord Captain and discarded {mf|him|her} to the corpse dump. But their torture failed to finish off the Rogue Trader. The path to escape and vengeance starts at the very bottom of the grave.

The xenos underestimated the Lord Captain and discarded {mf|him|her} to the corpse dump. But their torture failed to finish off the Rogue Trader. The path to escape and vengeance starts at the very bottom of the grave.

languages.text: Les xénos ont sous-estimé {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} et l'ont simplement {mf|jeté|jetée} dans la décharge funéraire, mais leur torture n'a pas eu raison {mf|de lui|d'elle}. Le chemin de la vengeance et de l'évasion débute au fond de la tombe.
languages.original_text: The xenos underestimated the Lord Captain and discarded {mf|him|her} to the corpse dump. But their torture failed to finish off the Rogue Trader. The path to escape and vengeance starts at the very bottom of the grave.

traits.locale_text: Les xénos ont sous-estimé {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} et l'ont simplement {mf|jeté|jetée} dans la décharge funéraire, mais leur torture n'a pas eu raison {mf|de lui|d'elle}. Le chemin de la vengeance et de l'évasion débute au fond de la tombe.

languages.text: 异形低估了行商浪人的韧性，把{mf|他|她}丢进了尸堆。然而，敌人的折磨并没有夺走行商浪人的性命。行商浪人从这座坟墓的最深处爬了出来，踏上了逃亡与复仇的道路。
languages.original_text: The xenos underestimated the Lord Captain and discarded {mf|him|her} to the corpse dump. But their torture failed to finish off the Rogue Trader. The path to escape and vengeance starts at the very bottom of the grave.

traits.locale_text: 异形低估了行商浪人的韧性，把{mf|他|她}丢进了尸堆。然而，敌人的折磨并没有夺走行商浪人的性命。行商浪人从这座坟墓的最深处爬了出来，踏上了逃亡与复仇的道路。

languages.text: 異種族はロード・キャプテンを軽んじているのか、死体廃棄場に放置した。しかし彼らの拷問では自由開拓者の命を終わらせることはできなかった。脱出と復讐への道は、まさに墓の奥底から始まるのだ。
languages.original_text: The xenos underestimated the Lord Captain and discarded {mf|him|her} to the corpse dump. But their torture failed to finish off the Rogue Trader. The path to escape and vengeance starts at the very bottom of the grave.

traits.locale_text: 異種族はロード・キャプテンを軽んじているのか、死体廃棄場に放置した。しかし彼らの拷問では自由開拓者の命を終わらせることはできなかった。脱出と復讐への道は、まさに墓の奥底から始まるのだ。

languages.text: Die Xenos haben den Lord Captain unterschätzt und ihn auf den Leichenhaufen geworfen. Doch ihre Folter war nicht genug, um {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} zu töten. Der Weg zur Flucht und zur Rache beginnt ganz unten im Grab.
languages.original_text: The xenos underestimated the Lord Captain and discarded {mf|him|her} to the corpse dump. But their torture failed to finish off the Rogue Trader. The path to escape and vengeance starts at the very bottom of the grave.

traits.locale_text: Die Xenos haben den Lord Captain unterschätzt und ihn auf den Leichenhaufen geworfen. Doch ihre Folter war nicht genug, um {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} zu töten. Der Weg zur Flucht und zur Rache beginnt ganz unten im Grab.

languages.text: Los xenos han subestimado a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán al dejarl{mf|o|a} en el vertedero de cadáveres. Su tortura no ha bastado para rematar a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. El camino hacia la libertad y la venganza empieza en la tumba.
languages.original_text: The xenos underestimated the Lord Captain and discarded {mf|him|her} to the corpse dump. But their torture failed to finish off the Rogue Trader. The path to escape and vengeance starts at the very bottom of the grave.

traits.locale_text: Los xenos han subestimado a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán al dejarl{mf|o|a} en el vertedero de cadáveres. Su tortura no ha bastado para rematar a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. El camino hacia la libertad y la venganza empieza en la tumba.

languages.text: Zenolar, Lord Kaptan'ı hafife alıp onu ceset çöplüğüne attı. Fakat eziyetleri, Hür Tacir'i pes ettirmeye yetmedi. Kaçış ve intikam yolu, mezarın dibinden başlar.
languages.original_text: The xenos underestimated the Lord Captain and discarded {mf|him|her} to the corpse dump. But their torture failed to finish off the Rogue Trader. The path to escape and vengeance starts at the very bottom of the grave.
